section.p: Includes information related to the dental services provided for the patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] aspect with data type Code
Identifies graphical representation of the tooth this treatment applies to. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] canalNbr with data type String
Indicates the number of root canals that were involved.

Contains exactly one [1..1] createDate with data type Point In Time
Date treatment was recorded.
Contains exactly one [1..1] isJuvenile with data type Boolean

Contains exactly one [1..1] isPlan with data type Boolean
Whether the planned treatment will be performed during the patient's next appointment. Possible values are Yes, No etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] isVisible with data type Boolean

Contains exactly one [1..1] oralRegion with data type Code
Identifies the area of the dental treatment. Possible Values are areNone; areOneSurf; areTwoSurfs; areThreeSurfs; areFourormoreSurfs; areWholeTooth; areQuadrant; areSextant ; areArch; areHeader etc. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] rvu with data type Integer
Indicates whether or not a user can delete this record from treatment plan. Possible values are Yes, No, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] surfaceRoots with data type Code
Text string that identifies the surfaces that were involved in the treatment. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] toothNumber with data type Integer
Tooth number which require a tooth related treatment.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentCategory with data type String
Optional category that this item falls under in treatment planning and sequencing.

Contains zero or one [0..1] treatmentCondition, where its type is Treatment Condition
Treatment condition.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentId with data type Id
A unique identifier of a specific treatment.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentPhase with data type Integer
Identifies the phase of this treatment.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentStatus with data type Code
Identifies the status of the treatment. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentType with data type Code
Identifies type of treatment. Possible values are Transaction; PerioExam; PSR; Head&Neck etc.
Contains zero or more [0..*] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer

Contains exactly one [1..1] dentalActivitySystem, where its type is Dental Activity System Reporting
This is an association to Dental Activity System (DAS)

Contains zero or one [0..1] dentalProcedure, where its type is Dental Procedure
Dental Procedure Provided.

Contains at least one [1..*] dentalVisit, where its type is Outpatient Visit
Dental Visit.

Contains zero or more [0..*] headAndNeck, where its type is Soft Tissue Exam
Head and Neck realted observation.

Contains zero or one [0..1] materialUsed, where its type is Dental Material
Material Used in a treatment.

Contains zero or one [0..1] nullification, where its type is Nullify Act
Control Act / Nullifying Act.

Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
The patient who is the subject of this dental treatment.
Contains zero or more [0..*] periodontalExamination, where its type is Periodontal Observation
Contains zero or one [0..1] plaqueObservation, where its type is Plaque Observation
Contains zero or more [0..*] practitioner, where its type is Individual Provider
